thread.title: Mrs Linda Daffern
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Mrs Linda Daffern

author: Mrs Linda Daffern
title: Mrs Linda Daffern
text: I ordered a Barber cap for my husband. The order was easy to place and arrived very quickly. Unfortunately I had ordered the wrong size and had to return it. The returns method was extremely easy and free of charge and a replacement arrived very quickly too. Would recommend this company and would certainly use them again.
